limited.translation[0].definitions[0].de: not very great in amount, number, ability etc
limited.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: My knowledge of the business is limited.
The organization has very limited resources.
So far, the education reforms have had only limited success.
There are only a limited number of tickets available.
Unfortunately, the drug is of limited value in treating cancer.
limited.translation[1].definitions[0].de: used after the name of British business companies that have limited liability
limited.translation[2].definitions[0].de: used after the name of a company to show that it is a LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY
limited.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Perkins Slade Limited, a highly regarded insurance broking business
